Recently for my younger son's Hydrocele's condition consulted our dr. He immediately referred his friend, A Urological Surgeon and gave his mobile number too to reach him anytime. God's grace, my lil one undergone surgery 3 days ago and doing well. Many thanks to you dr. Your service to the society is priceless. My children are in good hands.

Firstly, Iam super satisfied with Dr. John's Friendly approach with babies and his way of clear explanation  on health, development & medicines to be given. Thank you so much Doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. John is very patient and experienced in dealing with kids. He explains the issue clearly and gives the appropriate prescription. He also believes in holistic healing and avoids prescribing antibiotics indiscriminately.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to Dr.John for my son's vaccinations since he was 2 months old. Very less wait time. Takes plenty of time to clear all the doubts. It's rare to see doctors taking time to answer all the queries in detail like him. You leave the clinic completely satisfied with the visit. Safe during covid times as the clinic is very hygienic and all the safety precautions are followed. When you have an infant in this pandemic, and see the doctor sanitizing even the measuring tape, you know your baby is in safe hands. Also clarifies questions over WhatsApp and video consultation which is so helpful for an anxious mom.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We Met Dr Cheri Mathews John in 2013 when our daughter fell sick, we had to fly back from Seychelles because she was critical. I still remember how I kept visiting all the top hospitals in Chennai to just find why my 8 months daughter was so sick, everyone came up with different suggestions and we were in tremendous pressure. 
That's when we met Dr John, he assisted and educated us the best as our daughter was suffering from a rare genetic disorder. He took so much effort in discussing the case with international Doctors and helped us in managing her condition. He has always been available for discussion and been very gentle in explaining each of our queries. My daughter is 7.5 years now and we have never consulted any other DR because the trust we have in DR John is irreplaceable. DR John has always been at our service and we can't thank him enough. We recommend him 100% and he is the best.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: We had been to many doctors before but Dr C M Johns Angel clinic is totally different in terms of hygiene & handling the illness.Dr john precribes what is really required with out compromising   quality and  effectiveness. I never heard or seen  any doctor showing  the actual recommended price and expiry of the vaccine before  injecting. (Most of the doctors will  try to hide all these and charges abnormally by quoting foreign medicine).My first visit to Dr john was in the year 2012 when my son was 2 years old as i was referred by one of  my friend whose  daughter had dengue which was diagnosed and treated by Dr CM John.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Experienced friendly doctor.. He thoroughly examined my 4month old baby. He explains everything very clearly. First we just went for general check-up. That time we understood he examines very well and we have decided to shift our child's vaccination from previous doctor. Then we got to know there was one vaccination missed by our previous Dr. which was found by him and later it was taken care. Patients don't need to wait for long time. In case of emergencies he reply promptly in whatsapp* * *** *** ** ** * **** **** ************ *** recommends him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He is great with children nd always available on whatsapp also if any problem ‚Ä¶ will recommend to others also

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Dr. C M John has become our family's 'go to' doctor. He won us over with his precise diagnosis each time with took our baby to him, his treatment has always been spot on! Also, no matter how many questions we may have concerning the illness or the treatment, he ALWAYS gives us a patient hearing and has never once shown the slightest sign of getting annoyed or impatient. He always explains the root cause of the illness and makes sure we understand what is happening in terms of the treatment. Dr. John is someone you can count on 100% in case of an emergency. Overall, our experience with Dr. John has been great and we have recommended him to our family and friends and they too have given me very good feedback about him. We are so pleased to have him as our child's paediatrician and our family doctor. We have been consulting with Dr. John since 2013, and back then we used to live in Old Mahabalipuram Road, and take our child to Dr. John's clinic which is in Annanagar...that's 20 kilometres one way!!! So, that's how much we value and appreciate Dr. John.

review:
We took our son to meet Dr. John, for severe cold and fever. 

Our little boy was crying a lot during the diagnosis due to stranger anxiety. However Dr. John waited patiently until we settled the boy. He was very kind and handled our boy gently.

The medicines he prescribed were also the apt, and they put away that severe cough, cold and flu in a day. He explained to us the medication clearly as well. I have all my trust to recommend him for any Pediatric issues.
